snippet: “The Lighthouse,” the 1980 opera by Peter Maxwell Davies, is being performed at the John F. Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews Boston Lyric Opera's production of Peter Maxwell Davies opera The Lighthouse at the John F Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum; John Bellemer, Christopher Burchett and David Cushing star.
lead_paragraph: “The Lighthouse,” the 1980 opera by Peter Maxwell Davies, is being performed at the John F. Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum.

headline.main: Did They Crumble Into Thin Air? Only the Fog Could Tell
headline.print_headline: Did They Crumble Into Thin Air? Only the Fog Could Tell
